job_statement: Provide real-time payment processing and settlement for e-commerce businesses.

focus_market.reasoning: E-commerce businesses in Canada require fast and reliable payment processing to ensure a seamless customer experience. A solution that provides real-time payment processing and settlement would be a core growth innovation, perfecting the current paradigm.

outcome_expectations.expectation_statement: Increase the speed and reliability of payment processing.
Minimize the risk of payment delays and failures.
Minimize the likelihood of technical issues and downtime.
